reviewText: I love Guru Dutt. His movies are all classic one of a kind. The music, which is  essential in these movies, tells the sub story. His acting is as good as any of our western classic actors. He was one of a kind and not appreciated in his own time and the movie industry in India has forgotten his skill and talents.
Guru Dutt is the Orson Wells of Indian Cinema. I know I'm not the first one to make this comparison, but I have to say some thing because Amazon.com requires this many words to leave feedback.
